name: Rise From The Ashes
description:
Rise From The Ashes is an real time strategy game where the player controls The Separatists forces who are against Atlantic Empire, who after surviving the Bombs are trying to take control of what is left of post nuclear Europe 

To do so you will build your army of massive tanks and your base  to push back or eliminate the Atlantic Empire from the Baltic States. 

To win you will need to take out the enemy HQ but that is also the enemy goal. 

Designers

- Ashley Foster-Johnson 

- William Mason

- Jay Tutty

- Corey Hunt

Artists

- Brodie Dunn

- Ethan Lomer

- Logan Luckin

- Michael Le
